title: Boston Red Sox average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 53.38 was reached at Year 2011,  2012, and 2013
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 50.24 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
